page.title: 15BLURTON METHODIST CHURCH
page.content: Blurton Methodist Church was opened in 1964. Mr.Dodd spends only a small fraction of his time at Blurton Church as Blurton is only one of the four churches in his circuit. This circuit is called the Stoke South circuit and includes Longton, Fenton, Trentham, Blurton, Stoke and Blythe Bridge. He preaches at Normacot, Blurton, Fulford and Trentham. He is helped by 24 local preachers and 3 other ministers. There are 16 churches altogether in the Stoke South circuit. This is a diary of a week in his life: On Monday morning he went to see the relatives of a deceased person and finalise the funeral arrangements. Next he went to arrange a baptism service. In the afternoon he went to visit an old people's home. On Tuesday morning he held a funeral service at Blurton church.
